content:
Have you asked this question in the thunderbird-android Support Forum or checked to see if some info is already available? https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/products/thunderbird-android

The only other info I located was this and that error message relates to using correct server settings. In this instance it was a sending issue, but error seems to be something not set up correctly. https://forum.k9mail.app/t/receiving-mails-works-but-sending-doesnt-cannot-connect-to-server-unexpected-character-42/7530
creator: Toad-Hall
